sourcesContent:
<template>
  <st-panel>
    <st-form :form="form" labelWidth="125px">
      <seckill-form
        isEdit
        v-model="info"
        :decorators="decorators"
        :form="form"
        :isSubmit="isSubmit"
        @change="onChange"
        @save="onSave"
        @submit="onSubmit"
      ></seckill-form>
    </st-form>
  </st-panel>
</template>
<script>
import SeckillForm from '../components#/seckill-form.vue'
import { ruleOptions } from '../components#/seckill-form.config'
import { EditService } from './edit.service'
import { pick, isEqual } from 'lodash'

export default {
  name: 'BrandAppPluginDiscountAdd',
  bem: {
    b: 'brand-app-plugin-discount-add'
  },
  components: {
    SeckillForm
  },
  serviceInject() {
    return {
      service: EditService
    }
  },
  rxState() {
    return {
      loading: this.service.loading$,
      info: this.service.info$
    }
  },
  computed: {
    formValue() {
      return this.info
    }
  },
  data() {
    const form = this.$stForm.create()
    const decorators = form.decorators(ruleOptions)
    return {
      form,
      decorators,
      isSubmit: 0
    }
  },
  watch: {
    formValue: {
      handler(newVal, oldVal) {
        if (isEqual(newVal, oldVal)) return
        this.$nextTick(() => {
          console.log('edit-watch-formValue-change', { ...newVal })
          this.form.setFieldsValue({
            formValue: pick(newVal, [
              'activity_name',
              'product_type',
              'product_id'
            ])
          })
        })
      },
      deep: true,
      immediate: true
    }
  },
  mounted() {},
  methods: {
    onChange(e) {
      console.log('info-change', e, { ...this.info })
    },
    onSave() {
      this.formValue._isPass = true
      this.isSubmit++
    },
    // 保存
    onSubmit(e, flag) {
      console.log('校验结果', e._isPass, flag)
      console.log('submit', { ...this.formValue, ...e })
      if (e._isPass) {
        this.service.editSeckill({ ...this.formValue, ...e }).subscribe(() => {
          this.$router.push({
            path: './list'
          })
        })
      }
    }
  }
}
</script>
